alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 17 at 11:40PM MDT until October 18 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures 27 to 32 expected, coldest on the eastern plains. * WHERE...El Paso, Pueblo, Crowley, Otero, Kiowa, Bent and Prowers Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
